channel.title: Just wondering if anyone else does this
channel.description:
I didn't know if this belonged here, the programming section, or the game section, so I figured when in doubt just post it in the spam section(I mean general section :| )
Well lately I found myself doing this again:
It all started when I first started programming in blitz, about 2 years ago or more. Everytime I'd play a game, I'd be thinking in my head, the pseudocode to what's currently happening in the game. Finally I stopped doing that after a while, as it was annoying my friends how I'd always be like "Oh I know how they could make this part" etc.. Then I got into 3D modelling. I started pointing out every single flaw I could find with any texture or 3d model, that was realy pissing my friends off. I finally stopped doing that too.
Now I started learning java, and I'm doing it again! I was playing call of duty 3 today, and It took me a while to realise what the hell I was thinking, i caught myself thinking the pseudocode for how they write their great AI in that game. Now watch when me and my friends get together, I can piss them off even more when we play nhl 07 :D
Anybody else ever do this, or am I alone on this one?

I do that a lot.

But don’t say it like you do. :rolleyes:
